verses.verse: Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of your people,<WH5971> and say<WH559> to them, When<WH3588> I bring<WH935> the sword<WH2719> on a land,<WH776> if the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> take<WH3947> a man<WH376> of their coasts,<WH7097> and set<WH5414> him for their watchman:<WH6822>
If when he sees<WH7200> the sword<WH2719> come<WH935> on the land,<WH776> he blow<WH8628> the trumpet,<WH7782> and warn<WH2094> the people;<WH5971>

Then whoever hears<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> and takes not warning;<WH2094> if the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and take<WH3947> him away, his blood<WH1818> shall be on his own head.<WH7218>
He heard<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> and took not warning;<WH2094> his blood<WH1818> shall be on him. But he that takes warning<WH2094> shall deliver<WH4422> his soul.<WH5315>

But if<WH3588> the watchman<WH6822> see<WH7200> the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and blow<WH8628> not the trumpet,<WH7782> and the people<WH5971> be not warned;<WH2094> if the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and take<WH3947> any person<WH5315> from among them, he is taken<WH3947> away in his iniquity;<WH5771> but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1875> at the watchman's<WH6822> hand.<WH3027>

So you, O son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> I have set<WH5414> you a watchman<WH6822> to the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> therefore you shall hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> at my mouth,<WH6310> and warn<WH2094> them from me.

When I say<WH559> to the wicked,<WH7563> O wicked<WH7563> man, you shall surely die;<WH4191> if you do not speak<WH1696> to warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> from his way,<WH1870> that wicked<WH7563> man shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity;<WH5771> but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at your hand.<WH3027>

Nevertheless, if<WH3588> you warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> of his way<WH1870> to turn<WH7725> from it; if he do not turn<WH7725> from his way,<WH1870> he shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity;<WH5771> but you have delivered<WH5337> your soul.<WH5315>

Therefore, O you son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> Thus<WH3651> you speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559> If<WH3588> our transgressions<WH6588> and our sins<WH2403> be on us, and we pine<WH4743> away in them, how<WH349> should we then live?<WH2421>

Say<WH559> to them, As I live,<WH2416> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I have no<WH518> pleasure<WH2654> in the death<WH4194> of the wicked;<WH7563> but that the wicked<WH7563> turn<WH7725> from his way<WH1870> and live:<WH2421> turn<WH7725> you, turn<WH7725> you from your evil<WH7451> ways;<WH1870> for why<WH4100> will you die,<WH4191> O house<WH1004> of Israel?<WH3478>

Therefore, you son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of your people,<WH5971> The righteousness<WH6666> of the righteous<WH6662> shall not deliver<WH5337> him in the day<WH3117> of his transgression:<WH6588> as for the wickedness<WH7564> of the wicked,<WH7563> he shall not fall<WH3782> thereby in the day<WH3117> that he turns<WH7725> from his wickedness;<WH7562> neither<WH3808> shall the righteous<WH6662> be able<WH3201> to live<WH2421> for his righteousness in the day<WH3117> that he sins.<WH2398>

When I shall say<WH559> to the righteous,<WH6662> that he shall surely live;<WH2421> if he trust<WH982> to his own righteousness,<WH6666> and commit<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> all<WH3605> his righteousnesses<WH6666> shall not be remembered;<WH2142> but for his iniquity<WH5766> that he has committed,<WH6213> he shall die<WH4191> for it.
Again, when I say<WH559> to the wicked,<WH7563> You shall surely die;<WH4191> if he turn<WH7725> from his sin,<WH2403> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right;<WH6666>

If the wicked<WH7563> restore<WH7725> the pledge,<WH2258> give<WH7999> again<WH7999> that he had robbed,<WH1500> walk<WH1980> in the statutes<WH2708> of life,<WH2416> without<WH1115> committing<WH6213> iniquity;<WH5766> he shall surely live,<WH2421> he shall not die.<WH4191>
None<WH3808> of his sins<WH2403> that he has committed<WH2398> shall be mentioned<WH2142> to him: he has done<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right;<WH6666> he shall surely live.<WH2421>
Yet the children<WH1121> of your people<WH5971> say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal:<WH8505> but as for them, their way<WH1870> is not equal.<WH8505>
When the righteous<WH6662> turns<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH6666> and commits<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> he shall even die<WH4191> thereby.
But if the wicked<WH7563> turn<WH7725> from his wickedness,<WH7564> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he shall live<WH2421> thereby.
Yet you say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal.<WH8505> O you house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> I will judge<WH8199> you every<WH376> one<WH376> after his ways.<WH1870>

And it came<WH1961> to pass in the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of our captivity,<WH1546> in the tenth<WH6224> month, in the fifth<WH2568> day of the month,<WH2320> that one that had escaped<WH6412> out of Jerusalem<WH3389> came<WH935> to me, saying,<WH559> The city<WH5892> is smitten.<WH5221>

Now the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was on me in the evening,<WH6153> before<WH6440> he that was escaped<WH6412> came;<WH935> and had opened<WH6605> my mouth,<WH6310> until<WH5704> he came<WH935> to me in the morning;<WH1242> and my mouth<WH6310> was opened,<WH6605> and I was no<WH3808> more<WH5750> dumb.<WH481>
Then the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> they that inhabit<WH3427> those<WH428> wastes<WH2723> of the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478> speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559> Abraham<WH85> was one,<WH259> and he inherited<WH3423> the land:<WH776> but we are many;<WH7227> the land<WH776> is given<WH5414> us for inheritance.<WH4181>

Why<WH3651> say<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> You eat<WH398> with the blood,<WH1818> and lift<WH5375> up your eyes<WH5869> toward<WH413> your idols,<WH1544> and shed<WH8210> blood:<WH1818> and shall you possess<WH3423> the land?<WH776>

You stand<WH5975> on your sword,<WH2719> you work<WH6213> abomination,<WH8441> and you defile<WH2930> every<WH376> one<WH376> his neighbor's<WH7453> wife:<WH802> and shall you possess<WH3423> the land?<WH776>

Say<WH559> you thus<WH3541> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> As I live,<WH2416> surely<WH518> <WH3808> they that are in the wastes<WH2723> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> and him that is in the open<WH6440> field<WH7704> will I give<WH5414> to the beasts<WH2416> to be devoured,<WH398> and they that be in the forts<WH4679> and in the caves<WH4631> shall die<WH4191> of the pestilence.<WH1698>

For I will lay<WH5414> the land<WH776> most desolate,<WH8077> and the pomp<WH1347> of her strength<WH5797> shall cease;<WH7673> and the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478> shall be desolate,<WH8074> that none<WH369> shall pass<WH5674> through.

Then shall they know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I have laid<WH5414> the land<WH776> most desolate<WH8077> because<WH5921> of all<WH3605> their abominations<WH8441> which<WH834> they have committed.<WH6213>

Also, you son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> the children<WH1121> of your people<WH5971> still are talking<WH1696> against you by the walls<WH7023> and in the doors<WH6607> of the houses,<WH1004> and speak<WH1696> one<WH2297> to another,<WH259> every<WH376> one<WH376> to his brother,<WH251> saying,<WH559> Come,<WH935> I pray<WH4994> you, and hear<WH8085> what<WH4100> is the word<WH1697> that comes<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from the LORD.<WH3068>

And they come<WH935> to you as the people<WH5971> comes,<WH935> and they sit<WH3427> before<WH6440> you as my people,<WH5971> and they hear<WH8085> your words,<WH1697> but they will not do<WH6213> them: for with their mouth<WH6310> they show<WH6213> much love,<WH5690> but their heart<WH3820> goes<WH1980> after<WH310> their covetousness.<WH1215>

And, see,<WH2009> you are to them as a very<WH5690> lovely<WH5690> song<WH7892> of one that has a pleasant<WH3303> voice,<WH6963> and can play<WH5059> well on an instrument: for they hear<WH8085> your words,<WH1697> but they do<WH6213> them not.
And when this comes<WH935> to pass, (see,<WH2009> it will come,<WH935>) then shall they know<WH3045> that a prophet<WH5030> has been<WH1961> among<WH8432> them.
